price: Айтинг: «Парвардигорим, кечир, раҳм қил. Сен раҳм қилгувчиларнинг энг яхшисисан».
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ وَٱرۡحَمۡ وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi igh'fir wa-ir'ḥam wa-anta khayru al-rāḥimīna
